extendedInfo.description: This is the OFFICIAL application of the South Carolina Gamecocks created by the CBSSports.com College Network, in partnership with the University. This exclusive sports application offers LIVE STREAMED games:************************************************************LIVE VIDEO* & AUDIO*- Upgrade in the application to stream select games************************************************************* Audio and video are only available on certain compatible Android devices running OS2.2 or later. This device has not been tested for video compatibility. In order to access the audio or video please install the Sports Media Player in Google Play and re-launch this application.Annual Subscription $9.99ADDITIONAL APPLICATION FEATURES-	Live Scoring-	Play-by-Play-	Complete Sport Schedules-	Exclusive breaking sports news-	Video on demand-	Alerts (game start and final scores)-	Team and Coaches Rosters & Bios-	 Much moreâ¦COVERS ALL SCHOOL SPORTS!

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Best thing that ever happened to college football
reviews.author: George Nash

reviews.comment: Go cockS

reviews.comment: Go Cocks
reviews.author: Nikolas Headen

reviews.title: Freaking horrible...
reviews.comment: First and only app I\'ve ever paid for.. Piece of crap!!! Won\'t play audio or video. Have tried on 3 different phone.
reviews.author: Keith Tabor

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Add the option to use custom ringtones and pause, rewind and fast forward
reviews.author: Chris Young

reviews.title: No audio or video
reviews.comment: Waste of money

reviews.title: Don\'t buy paid version
reviews.comment: Paid for the audio and video version and it doesn\'t work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Many problems.
reviews.comment: Media does not stream live for baseball games. Can\'t read all of the news pages.(pages are cut short) Samsung galaxy nexus with android 4.1.1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 2 years
reviews.comment: 2 years and 2 diff phones and still can\'t get score notifications. Moving on to something that actually works.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This app is great I love using it
reviews.author: Twan Bogan

reviews.title: Bad!
reviews.comment: Use it. Like it. But clunky. UPDATE: can no longer use. CBS Sports should be ashamed! You have exclusive broadcast rights, I get that. But make it work or give it up.  UPDATE: Last weekend I finally had contact via email with CBS sports. After several emails trying to discover the problem, I was told this wold be forwarded to someone else. Still no answer. I have now missed almost an hour of the game. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY OR YOUR TIME WITH THESE FOLKS! THEY WILL NEVER HELP YOU. They actually could care less about the games. They collect their money cause they know you can\'t buy the game anywhere else and then you are on your own. They got a sweet deal, \"we have exclusive rights to all of the games, so you can\'t do anything but purchase from us\".
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App; Needs Some Adjusting
reviews.comment: For those that rated this app a \"1\", you might want to read phone requirements needed to run certain applications, in addition to subscribing/paying for elite services. So for some, it may be misleading, b/c you may have to pay those elite services.  I only used it to keep me updated on sport scores: occasionally an articles. But, what I haven\'t liked, is when I get alerted w/ a score update, I see it in my task list, but there\'s not way to delete it. I have to go into the app for the alert to go away.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No good
reviews.comment: This stinks never works
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Do Be Robbed
reviews.comment: Its legalized theft!  Doesn\'t work!

reviews.title: Where\'s my audio??
reviews.comment: I listened to the games I couldnt watch. After the update I don\'t see anywhere to listen to the game. WTF?? Don\'t let me down, fix this please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really?  What a f*cking ripoff...
reviews.comment: Here I am at work on gameday.  I downloaded the app and paid for audio.  Yes I know I should\'ve read the reviews before purchasing but the game just started, can you blame me?  PLEASE REFUND ME FOR THIS APP... or just make it actually work like yall promised.  Btw I have a HTC One S (T-Mo) running 4.0 ICS.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Even after update still no game audio.
reviews.comment: I paid for game audio and it didn\'t work total rip off. Stay away from this app! I have 4.0 ice cream sandwich.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not user-friendly
reviews.comment: Stories end abruptly, no way to page to rest of story. Can only page to next story in the news feed. Also, links within stories do not work. Tried contacting customer support about this twice. No answer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Is anybody home?
reviews.comment: The CBS developers(?) don\'t take emails. Google doesn\'t  respond. The USC AD Dept has failed to take action.  DO NOT BUY if you\'re expecting audio of Gamecock football.
reviews.author: A Google User
